resources.string: Failed to prepare the camera. The device may not support the function to use the front and rear cameras at the same time. Please try using a relatively recent device (a device with Android 11 or later pre-installed).
An unknown error occurred. Please try restarting the app.
You can activate the front and rear cameras at the same time.
It is likely available on relatively recent devices (devices that come pre-installed with Android 11 or later).
